name: Project Cupid
description:
Description: 

Cupid wants to spread love all over the town but spreading love causes him to lose his love power and without love power, he dies.

Instructions: 

Keep Cupid alive for the longest amount of time. Shooting targets increase score but decrease love power. Cupid dies when love power reaches zero. Airplanes, asteroids, and buildings kill instantly. Shooting large hearts increase love power. Shooting quivers increase the number of arrows Cupid has. Shooting dollars give cupid more score. Shooting bombs clear the screen.

Controls: 

  • Up and Down: Move cupid up and down 
  •  Space or X: Shoot arrows 
  •  M: Mute and UnMute sound
